data.title: Gloria Gaynor
data.text:
AKA Gloria Fowles

Born: 7-Sep-1949

Birthplace: Newark, NJ

Gender: Female

Religion: Born-Again Christian

Race or Ethnicity: Black

Sexual orientation: Straight

Occupation: Singer

Nationality: United States

Executive summary: I Will Survive

Father: Daniel Fowles

Mother: Queenie (d.)

Sister: Irma (d., murder)

Husband: Linwood Simon (m. 1979)

Grammy 1980 Best Disco Recording for I Will Survive

Abortion multiple

Born-Again Christian 1982

Wedding: David Gest and Liza Minnelli (2002)

Risk Factors: Smoking, Marijuana, Cocaine

FILMOGRAPHY AS ACTOR

The Secret Disco Revolution (8-Sep-2012) · Herself

Gray Matters (21-Oct-2006) · Herself

Official Website:

http://www.gloriagaynor.com/

Author of books:

I Will Survive (1995)
